pkgmetadata.longdescription: sphinxcontrib-toc=================``sphinxcontrib-toc`` is a Sphinx extension to allow .toc file to buildthe Table of Contents.This extension empower you to build complicated document with markuplanguages which can not define toctrees. Specifically, combination withrecommonmark, you don't need to write any reStructuredText in your document!Usage-----Append this extension in conf.py:: extensions = ['sphinxcontrib.toc']And configure following settings:``toc_title`` The default title of toctree if no titles in .toc file. By default, ``"{project} Documentation"``.``toc_numbered`` Same as ``:numbered:`` option of toctree directive. If enabled, Sphinx assigns section numbers. By default, ``true``..toc file---------.toc file is a list of documents like ``toctree`` directive:: section1 section2 section3You may define the title of toctree at top of the file:: # The title of document section1 section2 section3Tips----You can use "nested" .toc file like following:: /index.toc /part1.rst /part2.rst /part3/index.toc /part3/section1.toc /part3/section2.toc # In /index.toc part1 part2 part3/index # In /part3/index.toc section1 section2
